**鳞甲**（scale mail）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[铠甲](/wiki/%E9%93%A0%E7%94%B2 "铠甲")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。

[ ]

## 描述

鳞甲的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为4，且能提供[MC](/index.php?title=MC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "MC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")1。

## 策略

鳞甲的重量和锁环甲相同，但基础AC加成高1点，因此是更优的选择，不过，[秘银胶衣](/wiki/%E7%A7%98%E9%93%B6%E8%83%B6%E8%A1%A3 "秘银胶衣")仍然是前期的最优选。

## 历史

鳞甲最初于[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11中出现，也是[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")中最初加入游戏的物品之一。在[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")及更早版本，鳞甲不提供[MC](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94%EF%BC%883.4.3%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔（3.4.3） (page does not exist)")加成。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Scale armour](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scale_armour "wikipedia:Scale armour")***

鳞甲由小型片状护甲固定在布或皮革制的背衬上制成。鳞片的材料一般是金属或其他硬质材料，如硬化皮革或动物角。有一种形式相似的，被称作“[札甲](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:%E6%9C%AD%E7%94%B2 "wikipedia:zh:札甲")”的护甲，由片状护甲缝在一起制成，但没有背衬。世界各地的文明都有制造和使用这两类护甲，尤其是亚洲。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Scale_mail/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

In variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 and earlier versions, worn scale mail may not grant any MC.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), a [gnoll warrior](/wiki/Gnoll_warrior "Gnoll warrior") has an effective 19⁄30 chance of generating with scale mail.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), scale mail grants 2 base AC and 2 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") while worn, and its weight is reduced to 125 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum") (half its weight in vanilla *NetHack*).

[Soldier ants](/wiki/Soldier_ant "Soldier ant") on the Lawful Quest have a 3⁄10 chance of generating with scale mail fitted to their body shape, and [large dogs](/wiki/Large_dog "Large dog") have a 1⁄25 chance of being generated with scale mail fitted to their body shape.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), scale mail can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a ring mail and a [helmet](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet"). Scale mail can be used to forge a few items:

- Scale mail can be combined with [chain mail](/wiki/Chain_mail "Chain mail") to create [splint mail](/wiki/Splint_mail "Splint mail").
- Scale mail can be combined with ring mail to create [banded mail](/wiki/Banded_mail "Banded mail").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [Warriors](/wiki/Warrior_\(role\) "Warrior (role)") start the game with non-cursed +0 scale mail.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 696](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c#line696 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c")

描述

鳞甲的基础AC加成为4，且能提供MC1。

策略

鳞甲的重量和锁环甲相同，但基础AC加成高1点，因此是更优的选择，不过，秘银胶衣仍然是前期的最优选。

历史

鳞甲最初于Jay Fenlason's Hack的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11中出现，也是Hack 1.0中最初加入游戏的物品之一。在NetHack 3.4.3及更早版本，鳞甲不提供MC加成。

Soldier ants on the Lawful Quest have a 3⁄10 chance of generating with scale mail fitted to their body shape, and large dogs have a 1⁄25 chance of being generated with scale mail fitted to their body shape.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, scale mail can be created at a forge by combining a ring mail and a helmet. Scale mail can be used to forge a few items:
